title: Disco Ensemble - Viper Ethics (2003) [320kb]
description:
Viper Ethics is the first full-length studio album by Disco Ensemble, released in 2003 in Finland by Fullsteam Records.

"This is thrilling, edgy post-hardcore with huge choruses and colossal vats of energy. Fucking awesome!" Kerrang KKKKK

"These Finns plough a furious furrow of post-hardcore riffery and staccato punk rock tightness... You really should not miss this band." Drowned In Sound


Disco Ensemble surely is a very contemporary product, even though the band saw the light of day somewhere in 1996.
